articles.title: Colorado man accused of attacking TV reporter, saying ‘This is Trump’s America now’ - POLITICO

articles.author: Noah Sheidlower
articles.title: Meet the oversavers: Older Americans who have plenty for retirement but wish they'd worked less and vacationed more - Business Insider
articles.description: One retiree has "enough money to live until 95 and go on vacations." But then he got cancer. "I may not even enjoy the money I worked hard to save."
articles.content:
Joshua Winston, 70, did a pretty good job preparing for retirement: He ran two successful veterinary clinics, made smart investments, and lived frugally.
But a week after he retired in May, he was d… [+7333 chars]
